Articles.Content:
Well, I've ended flights, and of course the capsules are still there, safely landed on Kerbin. But I'm not sure what I do now. How do I return them to KSC, remove them from the playing field as it were? I don't want to have capsule markers sitting around everywhere and although I'm pretty sure Kerbals aren't naturally social creatures, especially the single pilots in the MK1 capsules could use a touch of civilization.

Edited June 21, 2013 by SuperWeegee4000
Answered nao.
You can't return them yet. KSP doesn't have that functionality at this time. You can go to your tracking station and abort what you want one by one with the big red X.
Thanks! I'll do that as soon as I get on tomorrow.
I think, if I read the weekly updates correctly, this is currently one of the things Harvester is working on.
